title: atha aruLilaiyO
sahitya:
attA aruLillaiyO ennaittaDuttLa manamillaiyO



anupallavi



pittA enravar mIdum piriyam vaitta karuNai siddhA parama

parishudddhA anAdimuttA



caraNam



sholla muDindadellAm sholli sholli aluttEn tollai sheiginrEn enru

shOdikka ninaittAyO

villAlum kallAlum vIshi yaDittavarai vENDi munnE tOnri ANDa dayAnidhiyE
